summary: Frontend testing completed for MegaRadio bug fixes. Genres tab now shows all 100+ genres (not just 3 from TV init). Profile page displays correctly for guest users. Favorites sorting logic verified in code.

ui_bugs.issue: Shows 'No stations found' despite TV init returning 21 popular stations. Console shows 8 cached stations but they don't render.

home_page.genres_section: PASS - Shows 3 genres from TV init (Folk music, Jazz Music, Rock)
home_page.popular_stations: FAIL - Shows 'No stations found' despite cached data
home_page.recently_played: PASS - Shows 'No recently played stations' (expected for new user)
home_page.stations_near_you: PASS - Shows 'Enable location to see nearby stations'
home_page.discoverable_genres_banner: PASS - Shows 3 genre cards with images
home_page.favorites_from_users: PASS - Shows user profiles with favorites count
home_page.tab_navigation: PASS - All 4 tabs visible (Discover, Genres, Favorites, Profile)

genres_tab.genres_count: PASS - Shows 100+ genres (verified Pop 4954, Music 4049, News 2562, Rock 2516, etc.)
genres_tab.uses_correct_api: PASS - Uses useGenres(1, 100) which calls /api/genres endpoint

profile_page.guest_user_header: PASS - Shows 'Guest User' with avatar icon
profile_page.settings_section: PASS - Shows Account, Language (English), Country (Not set), Private Profile (Login Required)
profile_page.about_section: PASS - Shows About Us, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy
profile_page.sign_in_button: PASS - Shows 'Sign In / Sign Up' button

favorites_page.empty_state: PASS - Shows 'You don't have any favorites yet' with discover link
favorites_page.sort_modal_code: PASS - Sort modal implemented with Newest/Oldest/A-Z/Z-A/Custom options

action_items: Investigate Popular Stations race condition - data is cached (8 stations) but not rendering on home page
Consider adding data-testid to React Native Web components for better testability
critical_code_review_comments: Genres tab fix verified - correctly uses useGenres(1, 100) to fetch from /api/genres instead of TV init cache
Favorites sorting correctly uses .toLowerCase() for case-insensitive comparison
Profile page styles are complete and rendering correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Genres tab shows all genres correctly. Popular Stations on home page shows 'No stations found' - may be race condition with TV init cache. Favorites sorting and view toggle need testing with actual favorites data.
